summary.title: Summary
text: SummaryFullstack Developer with 3 years experience in enterprise software development using Angular, Java, and Spring. Proficient in front- and backend development, including test automation with Selenium and Groovy, with a focus on E2E and API testing. Adept in agile methodologies and ability to collaborate in interdisciplinary teams, ensuring efficient project management and continuous improvement and delivery of software and delivery.

values.major: Computer Science and Media (Master of Science)

thesis.title: Thesis:
thesis.value: Machine Learning Methods for Facial Reenactment Creation and Detection

values.major: Computer Science and Media (Bachelor of Science)

tasks_old: Development and implementation of eCommerce platform
Development and implementation of microservices using modern technologies, including Docker, Kubernetes
Development of web apps using Angular, JavaScript and TypeScript
Development in the SAP Hybris environment based on Java and Spring with interfaces to ERP, BW and FirstSpirit
Introduction, consulting, training and 3rd level support of the solutions
tasks: Development, deployment, and maintenance of B2B and B2E software, including new features and customization of existing functionalities.
Close collaboration in interdisciplinary teams consisting of front-end, back-end developers, testers, product owners, and stakeholders, which increased efficiency and product quality.
Resolution of technical debt through refactoring and abstraction of software modules and components, improving code quality and maintainability and reducing future development and maintenance costs.
Leading development and automation of return and refund processes, which increased processing speed and customer satisfaction.
Leading development of a B2E resource and quality management system, which improved efficiency and safety standards in production facilities.
Development of a permissions concept for users with different roles, which enhanced security and compliance.
Introduction and implementation of Matomo for web analysis, leading to improved user insights and an optimized user experience.
Leading development and automation of test result submission in Jira, accelerating the post-release process.

Leading development, deployment, and hosting a software for integrating test management into the monitoring system and automated notification of the on-call service in case of system failures, which reduced downtime, shortened problem resolution times, and increased system availability.
Development, deployment, and maintenance of B2E Web Apps
Development and consumption of REST interfaces
Development of CLIs based on Node.js
Development of unit and E2E tests
Design and implementation of user interfaces

projects.title: Machine Learning Methods for Facial Reenactment Creation and Detection
projects.description: Development and optimization of machine learning models for generating and detecting DeepFakes:
tasks: Development of an ETL pipeline for video-based datasets
Development and optimization of a generative and a discriminative machine learning model
Development of logging and monitoring procedures
Data visualization and analysis of results

projects.title: Lab Work: Programming Intelligent Applications
projects.description: Implementation of selected applications from Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning including:
tasks: Data Mining
Digit Recognition using Object Recognition
Digit Generation using Generative Adversarial Networks
Word Embeddings and Deep Neural Networks for Document Classification
Deep Reinforcement Learning
Time-Series Prediction using Recurrent Neural Networks

projects.title: 3D Ken Burns Effect from a Single Image
projects.description: Implementation of the paper '3D Ken Burns Effect from a Single Image':
tasks: Train models for estimating and refining depth maps from an still image
Creating a point cloud of the input image and its estimated depth map
Projecting images from the point cloud and inpainting color and depth
Extending the point cloud by adding the inpainted values to the point cloud
Creating the 3d effect from multiple images captured from the point cloud

projects.title: Smart Penguins
projects.description: Development of a Car2x system for the prevention of traffic accidents based on a mesh network:
tasks: Implementation of an Android app for exchanging BLE messages
Transmitting BLE messages through the mesh network (FruityMesh)
Implementation of an early warning system on current traffic events
Dockerization of the software environment

projects.title: Easy Grow
projects.description: Development of an automatic irrigation system for plants based on the Wi-Fi microchip ESP8266:
tasks: Development of a web application for controlling the system remotely
Interactions via a hardware interface and a web application
Implementation of WiFi functions using Espressif IoT Platform
Dockerization of the software environment

projects.title: Next Search
projects.description: Cloud based development of a scalable search application for compressed content rendering of web pages:
tasks: Design and implementation of the cloud architecture and the web app
Processing and aggregation of website content through Cloud Functions
Caching of compressed contents
Access Management of different Cloud Providers

projects.title: Mobility Detection Library
projects.description: Development of an Android library for monitoring locations precisely and energy-efficiently, using smartphones' sensors, context information, and recognition of motion patterns:
tasks: Data analysis for recognizing different motion patterns
Analysis and optimization the power usage and the quality of monitoring, motion patterns, network, and charging informations
Development of the architecture for using the library in multiple applications simultaneously

projects.title: Autonomous Shuttle
projects.description: Drafting of an shuttle service for passenger transportation:
tasks: Design and development of a web service architecture
Design of an interactive ride through matching interests and recognizing emotions of the passengers
Developing a booking system
Interest matching through analyzing passengers' Instagram pictures
Using facial recognition for authentication

projects.title: Billtracker
projects.description: Development of native applications in Android and iOS for saving and synchronizing of receipts in firebase:
tasks: Design and implementation of the firebase database and storage
Design and implementation of the Android and iOS user interfaces
Synchronizing data and receipts from Firebase
Managing the locally saved documents in the file systems

projects.title: Crypto Currency Tracker
projects.description: Development of a Web App for comparing crypto currencies:
tasks: Using functional programming language Clojure
Generating HTML through Clojure library Hiccup
Consumption of the 'CryptoCompare' API for retrieving currency rates
Processing of the currency rates through Clojure
Representing the currency rates visually through clj-xchart

projects.title: WatchIt
projects.description: Development of a responsive Web App for retrieving movie and series information:
tasks: Design and development of a web service architecture
Design and implementation of an interactive and responsive web UI
Consumption of 'The Movie Database' API
Extending the web service enabling users to create accounts, watch, and favorite lists

projects.title: Cap'n Can Webshop
tasks: Design and development of a web service architecture
Design and implementation of an interactive and responsive web UI
Administrative view for maintenance of the product line
Implementation of the shopping cart and the booking process
Implementation of sessions
Prevention of security threats as XSS, XSRF, and SQL injections
Using of SSL/TLS encryption

projects.title: Private Eye
projects.description: Development of mobile weather stations for capturing environmental data und visualizing those in a Web App:
tasks: Design and development of a web service architecture
Design and implementation of an interactive and responsive web UI
Implementation of data exchange between embedded devices and web service
Implementation of visual representation of the weather stations' locations
